    Class Description
    Canvas
    Container of shapes
    Color  
    Color  
    Colorable
    Methods for modifying a shape color The color of the shape is used when drawing or filling
    Ellipse  
    Fillable
    Methods for filling a shape
    Keyboard
    Instantiate a Keyboard for obtaining key handling capability
    KeyboardEvent
    Keyboard events containing key codes and event types
    KeyboardEventType
    The type of events supported by the Keyboard
    KeyboardHandler
    Interface to be implemented by all classes that wish to receive keyboard events
    Line  
    Mouse
    Instantiate a Mouse for obtaining mouse handling capability
    MouseEvent
    Mouse event containing x and y coordinates
    MouseEventType
    The type of events supported by the Mouse
    MouseHandler
    Interface to be implemented by all classes that want to receive mouse events
    Movable
    Methods for moving a shape
    Picture
    A picture from an image file.
    Rectangle  
    Shape
    A shape that can be drawn on a canvas.
